channel.title: CVE Feed for DeBAAT -- WP Media Category Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DeBAAT -- WP Media Category Management

item.title: CVE-2024-32950|2024-04-24T08:25:50.058Z -- debaat -- wp%20media%20category%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in DeBAAT WP Media Category Management allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Media Category Management: from n/a through 2.2.
